ComicInfo.Summary:
The Shredder returns! Oroku Saki has been to Hell and back, but will he now come to the Turtles as friend or foe? Meanwhile, April makes a stand against Baxter Stockman—with dangerous consequences.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Nelson Daniel | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Fahriza Kamaputra (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Karl Johnsson | 3 |
